sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store

Class CashStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store.Store
      • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store.CashStore

  • public class CashStore
extends Store
    This object represents the store of cash in the vending machine.
    Version:
    3.0 5/07/2003
    Author:
    Olivo Miotto, Pang Ping Li
    See Also:
    CashStoreItem, Coin, DrinksBrand, DrinksStore, DrinksStoreItem, Store, StoreController, StoreItem, StoreObject

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int findCashStoreIndex(Coin c)
      This method find and returns the index of the coin in the CashStore of the given Coin.
      Coin findCoin(double weight)
      This method will locate a Coin denomination held, with the input data (coin weight). If found, it returns an existence identifier (reference). Otherwise, it informs the requestor that the coin is invalid.

      This method determine whether the given weight of the Coin is valid.

    • Method Detail

      • findCashStoreIndex

        public int findCashStoreIndex(Coin c)
        This method find and returns the index of the coin in the CashStore of the given Coin.
        Parameters:
        c - the Coin of interest.
        Returns:
        the index of the given Coin. Return -1 if unknown Coin is detected.

      • isValidWeight

        public boolean isValidWeight(double weight)
        This method determine whether the given weight of the Coin is valid.
        Parameters:
        weight - the weight of the Coin to be tested.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the weight is valid, otherwise, return FALSE.

      • findCoin

        public Coin findCoin(double weight)
        This method will locate a Coin denomination held, with the input data (coin weight). If found, it returns an existence identifier (reference). Otherwise, it informs the requestor that the coin is invalid.
        Parameters:
        weight - the weight of the coin to be found.
        Returns:
        Coin the coin which has the input weight.
